categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Bannistar Station was one of the first engagements of the New Republic after the Battle of Endor.
Admiral Nantz was given command of the First Fleet, tasked with operations in the galaxy's Western Reaches. He staged his campaign from the planet Saijo after the end of the Nagai–Tof War.
A battle group, with starfighter operations overseen by Adar Tallon, struck Bannistar Station, capturing the Imperial installation following a heavy bombardment.
